# ğŸš€ Wakili Pro - Quick Deployment Reference

## ğŸ“± Quick Commands

### Local Development
```bash
# Start development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Run tests
npm test

# Type check
npm run type-check

# Lint code
npm run lint
```

### Deployment
```bash
# Automatic: Push to main
git push origin main

# Manual: Use GitHub Actions UI
# Actions â†’ Production Deployment v2 â†’ Run workflow
```

## ğŸ”‘ Environment Variables

Copy `.env.template` to `.env.local`:
```bash
cd frontend
cp .env.template .env.local
```

Edit `.env.local` with your values.

## ğŸ“Š Workflow Status

| Workflow | Purpose | Trigger | Status |
|----------|---------|---------|--------|
| production-deploy-v2 | Main deployment | Push to main | âœ… Active |
| ci-cd | PR validation | Pull requests | âœ… Active |
| deploy-vercel-backup | Backup/debug | Manual | âš ï¸ Backup |
| deploy | GitHub Pages | Manual | ğŸ”´ Disabled |

## ğŸ”§ Required Secrets

Set in **GitHub Settings â†’ Secrets and variables â†’ Actions**:

- `VERCEL_TOKEN` - Get from [Vercel Settings](https://vercel.com/account/tokens)
- `VERCEL_ORG_ID` - Find in Vercel project settings
- `VERCEL_PROJECT_ID` - Find in Vercel project settings

## ğŸ“ Important URLs

- **Production**: Auto-generated by Vercel (*.vercel.app)
- **Backend API**: https://wakili-pro.onrender.com/api
- **GitHub Repo**: https://github.com/mpmbugua/wakili-pro
- **Vercel Dashboard**: https://vercel.com

## âœ… Pre-Deployment Checklist

- [ ] Tests passing locally
- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] No ESLint warnings
- [ ] Build succeeds locally
- [ ] Environment variables configured
- [ ] Backend API accessible

## ğŸ†˜ Quick Troubleshooting

### Build Fails
```bash
# Clear cache and rebuild
rm -rf dist node_modules
npm install
npm run build
```

### Deployment Fails
1. Check GitHub Actions logs
2. Verify Vercel secrets
3. Check Vercel dashboard
4. Review backend API status

### Tests Fail
```bash
# Run tests with verbose output
npm test -- --reporter=verbose

# Run single test file
npm test path/to/test.ts
```

## ğŸ“ Support Contacts

- **Deployment Issues**: Check GitHub Actions logs
- **Vercel Issues**: Check Vercel dashboard
- **Code Issues**: Create GitHub issue
